CustomField.description: The calculated Pay Total (Number) for the Pay Transaction
CustomField.formula: If (ISBLANK (tc9_pr__Pay_Rate__c), 0 ,tc9_pr__Pay_Rate__c) * IF (ISBLANK( tc9_pr__Pay_Multiplier__c ), 1 ,tc9_pr__Pay_Multiplier__c) * If ( ISBLANK(tc9_pr__Quantity__c), 1, tc9_pr__Quantity__c ) * If (OR(ISBLANK(tc9_pr__Leave_Rate_Multiplier__c), tc9_pr__Leave_Rate_Multiplier__c = 0), 1, tc9_pr__Leave_Rate_Multiplier__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The calculated Pay Total (Number) for the Pay Transaction
CustomField.label: Pay Total
